level.heading: Dismissal of complaint.
level.text: A complaint may be dismissed on the following grounds:
The complaint is deemed to lack merit;
The complainant refuses to cooperate with the investigation; or
If, after the Executive Director refers a complaint for mediation, the complainant willfully fails to participate in good faith in the mediation process.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 12-208, see Historical and Statutory Notes following ยง 5-1101.
